Animals would have the right to legal representation, allowing them to argue their case in court, potentially leading to changes in laws that harm or exploit them.
Animals would be entitled to receive medical care, just as humans do, ensuring they are healthy and well-cared for.
Animal cruelty would be punished more severely, with those convicted of harming animals facing harsher penalties.
Animals would have the right to a fair trial, allowing them to defend themselves in court if they are accused of a crime.
Animals would be protected from discrimination, ensuring they are treated equally regardless of their species.
